subject: Shipping Address Confirmation Request
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,

I hope this message finds you well.

I placed an order on your website yesterday and received the FedEx tracking
number today. However, when I checked the tracking information, it shows
that the final destination is Wellington, Florida.

I am located in Deerfield Beach, Florida, and I would like to kindly ask
you to verify that the shipping address on my order is correct. Could you
please confirm the delivery address associated with my order?

Thank you for your help and I look forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Luiz.
Order #SSN1944
